name: Ralph Breaks The Internet Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: While sitting inside the power cord, what game were Ralph and Vanellope playing when the movie began?
questions.explanation:
I Spy.

	Vanellope had to guess what Ralph was describing with just a color. She guessed Pac-man because he was the only yellow circle in the area. Ralph told her it could have been Mrs. Pac-man or Baby Pac-man, but it was in fact Pac-man.

questions.text: Because of a virus, what game did Vanellope and Ralph get stuck inside after having root beers at Tappers?
questions.explanation:
Tron.

	Vanellope reminded Ralph that the game had a virus, but Ralph told her the virus had been fixed. While speeding through the course, Ralph and Vanellope became stuck when the virus took over the game during a high speed race.

questions.text: After the steering wheel of Sugar Rush was broken, the game was shut down. Who took in all the extra racers, except Vanellope?
questions.explanation:
Felix Jr. and Tamora Jean

	After Mr. Litwick pulled the plug on Sugar Rush, all the characters were displaced. Felix Jr. and Tamora Jean (married for six years) took in all fifteen female racers. Vanellope went to live with Ralph.

questions.text: After going through the arcade's modem and entering the internet, what site did Vanellope and Ralph learn had the Sugar Rush steering wheel they wanted to buy?
questions.explanation:
Ebay.

	Neither Vanellope nor Ralph understood that actual money was needed to buy the steering wheel. They had to find a site that would pay them money to find items in video games because they needed $27,001 to buy the Sugar Rush steering wheel.

questions.text: Gal Gadot voiced what main character in the racing game Slaughter Race?
questions.explanation:
Shank.

	Shank was the leader of the car theft ring in the game Slaughter Race. Vanellope loved the game because she could drive wherever she wanted and didn't have to worry about tracks.

questions.text: What kind of BuzzTube video did Ralph NOT do to make money to buy the Sugar Rush steering wheel?
options: Ralph creating a cat eye with makeup
questions.explanation:
Ralph in a soap opera.

	Shank told Vanellope and Ralph about a woman at BuzzTube named Yes (voiced by Taraji Henson) who would help him get money for making videos. While Vanellope went out into the internet trying to get people to click on Ralph's videos, Ralph was making the videos.

questions.text: When Vanellope met the Disney princesses, which princess did she have trouble understanding?
questions.explanation:
Merida.

	Merida "spoke Scottish" and Vanellope didn't understand her. Ariel told Vanellope none of them understood what Merida said but blamed it on the fact that she was from the other Disney studio.

questions.text: What caused Slaughter Race to reboot while Vanellope was inside the game?
questions.correct: Ralph inserted a virus into the game.
options: Ralph started smashing the game trying to get to Vanellope.
Vanellope won the race when she wasn't supposed to be in the game.
Slaughter Race was being shut down.
questions.explanation:
Ralph inserted a virus into the game.

	Ralph didn't want Vanellope to leave him so he came upon a virus that would destroy Slaughter Race so Vanellope would leave the internet with him. When Vanellope found what he had done, she was angry and left Ralph. The virus got out of Slaughter Race and used Ralph as a way to corrupt the entire internet. The only way to stop it was for Ralph to admit that he and Vanellope could still be friends and not be with each other every day. Once Ralph admitted that, the virus disappeared from the internet.

questions.text: Did Vanellope return as a character in the Slaughter Race game?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Shank rewrote Vanellope's code so she could be a player in the Slaughter Race game and not be a glitch like she was in the Sugar Rush game. Ralph went back to the arcade

questions.text: In the mid-credit scene, Ralph was playing a computer game called Pancakes and Milkshakes. What animal did Ralph overfeed with pancakes and caused to explode?
questions.explanation:
Rabbit.

	The mid-credit scene had the young Moana look-alike riding in a car with her mom. She mentioned to her mom that the movie they just watched a scene in the trailer that wasn't in the movie. The mom suggests the little girl play on her tablet. She begins a game called Pancakes and Milkshakes. Ralph takes over the game and begins force feeding the rabbit pancakes until the rabbit explodes. The mid-credit scene ended with the young Moana look-alike screaming.
